description:
Abe no Haruakira, also known as Abe no Seimei, is a legendary Japanese magician who devoted his life to the extermination of the Ends soon after he first appeared in the new world as a http://anidb.net/ch86429 [Drifter]. He now serves as the leader of the http://anidb.net/ch86428 [Octobrist Organization].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Abe no Haruakira
